title: Test Login Successful
manualSteps: 1. Open a clean browser instance (Chrome/Firefox/Edge) in incognito/private mode.
2. Navigate to https://www.saucedemo.com/ and wait until the page fully loads (verify the URL and that the login form is visible).
3. Locate the Username input field (placeholder="Username") and click into it.
4. Type the exact string standard_user (case-sensitive) into the Username field.
5. Locate the Password input field (placeholder="Password") and click into it.
6. Type the exact string secret_sauce into the Password field (hidden characters are expected).
7. Verify that both fields contain the correct values (username visible, password masked).
8. Locate the Login button (text equals "Login") and ensure it is enabled.
10. Wait for the browser to finish navigation and verify the new URL is https://www.saucedemo.com/inventory.html.
11. Confirm that the inventory page loads successfully (check for visible page heading or at least one inventory item card).
12. (Optional) Capture a screenshot for evidence and log the result as PASS/FAIL.
